definitions.definition: to be brave enough to do something difficult or dangerous, or to be rude or silly enough to do something that you have no right to do:
examples: I was going to ask if his dog was better, but I didn't dare in case she had died.

definitions.definition: something you do because someone dares you to:
examples: He jumped in the river at twelve o'clock last night as (also US on/UK for) a dare.
